venue.name: P-Sam's Bar & Grill & Chatterly's Banquet Facility

item.description:
Long for the "old days" of Disco and 70's music. Well join us for a special night when this band delivers all the old tyme favorites. Take a look...

http://www.shoproductions.com/disco/index.html

The All-Star Dyn-O-Myte Disco Review is the East Coast's hottest and most authentic "Flashback to the '70's" band. The six-piece group combines great dance music from the disco/funk era with a fun, interactive stage show that appeals to people of all ages.  Turn the night into a  memorable experience. They perform hits by Donna Summer, K.C. & the Sunshine Band, The Bee Gees, The Village People, Earth, Wind & Fire, Gloria Gaynor and many more

So join us at P. Sam's ($5.00 cover) and boogie the years away! Showtime:  9:30 p.m. to 1 a.m....   venue is located at Eastwood Country Club which is at 1301 Torringford West St..... great dance floor and party atmosphere at this venue.... get there early ... and enjoy the excellent food....!! If you want to get a bite to eat, I'll be there at 8:30...join me then, if you would like!

BTW...Thanks for the suggestion, Lynne!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup sign...Cell is 203-808-5829
item.why: We're taking a walk down Memory Lane...

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Disco Anyone? The All Star Disco Dyn-O Myte Disco Review...
